(UNITURN mérőállomás alsó szerelőlap pizero bolcso)
(cmd line: -i usb_kengyel.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d2 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f900

safetop0.250
safebottom0.250
overcut0.300

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.0045

fmax900
fmin600
fratio0.6

z1 = 2
c1 = 0.030 #furatok
c2 = 0.040 #letörések
c3 = 0.050 #keret

(körvonal)
b outline 0,0 size44,47 z$z1 c$c3 g2,1,0.3 r0

l 11,0 11,11 z$z1 c$c3
l 33,0 33,11 z$z1 c$c3

l 0,21 6,21 z$z1 c$c3
l 44,21 38,21 z$z1 c$c3

l 0,41.5 44,41.5 z1 c$c3

(2)
b outline 46,0 size44,47 z$z1 c$c3 g2,1,0.3 r0 nl0,1,1,1

l 57,0 57,11 z$z1 c$c3
l 79,0 79,11 z$z1 c$c3

l 46,21 52,21 z$z1 c$c3
l 90,21 84,21 z$z1 c$c3

l 46,42.5 90,42.5 z1 c$c3

(3)
b outline 92,0 size55.7,20 z$z1 c$c3 g2,1,0.3 r0 nl0,1,1,1

l 98,0 98,11 z$z1 c$c3
l 139.7,0 139.7,11 z$z1 c$c3

(4)

b outline 92,22 size55.7,20 z$z1 c$c3 g2,1,0.3 r0 nl0,1,1,0

l 98,22 98,33 z$z1 c$c3
l 139.7,22 139.7,33 z$z1 c$c3

(5)

b outline 92,22 size55.7,44 z$z1 c$c3 g2,1,0.3 r0 nl0,1,1,0
